question: [Study] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (97, 210), (153, 97), (121, 136).

qas.question: [Study] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (97, 210), (153, 97), (121, 136).
[Focus] Svenska: Berakna arean och omkretsen for triangeln med (97, 210), (153, 97), (121, 136). Provide only the area.
[Focus] Italiano: Calcola area e perimetro del triangolo con vertici (97, 210), (153, 97), (121, 136). Provide only the perimeter.
